mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_ID,BOARD_TITLE,MEMBER_ID,TO_CHAR(BOARD_DATE,'YY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ROLE='N' ORDER BY BOARD_ID DESC
mapper.insert:
SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(BOARD_ID) IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE MAX(BOARD_ID) + 1 END AS ID FROM BOARD
INSERT INTO BOARD VALUES (#{boardId},#{memberId},SYSDATE,#{boardTitle},#{boardContent},0,#{boardAttach},#{boardAttachDir},'N')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ROLE='N' AND BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET BOARD_HIT = BOARD_HIT + 1 WHERE BOARD_ROLE='N' AND BOARD_ID = #{id}
